snippet: Which system is better: a European model that encourages equality, creativity and a healthy lifestyle or an Asian model that focuses on technical skills and concrete results? Students: Where would you rather study? Parents: Where would you want your...
abstract: Which system is better: a European model that encourages equality, creativity and a healthy lifestyle or an Asian model that focuses on technical skills and concrete results? Students: Where would you rather study? Parents: Where would you want your children to be?

headline.main: How Much Homework Does It Take to Educate a Nation?
